data.title: 准备以至少30秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: From this picture, we can see that there are a lot of cows on the grass, and most of them are in black and white color, but two of them have different colors, which is brown. Also, the grass looks so green that it must be delicious for these cows to eat. In the background of the picture, there is a beautiful blue sky and some trees as well as some hills, which may indicate that this picture was taken from the countryside or a cow farm. These cows may produce some nourishing milk as they live in a pleasant environment. （101 字）
